00018 #define  MAX_EP_PKT_BUFS  4
00019 
00020 
00021 /** Core: Structure used by driver for buffer management in end-point 
00022           communication. */
00023 typedef  struct {
00024 
00025     /** List of buffers */
00026     cvmx_buf_ptr_t  buf[MAX_EP_PKT_BUFS];
00027 
00028     /** Internal gather pointer used by driver. */
00029     cvmx_buf_ptr_t  gptr;
00030 
00031 } cn56xx_ep_buflist_t;
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036 /** Core: Structure passed by application to send data to another endpoint. */
00037 typedef struct {
00038 
00039     /** Tag in IH to use in input queue command. */
00040     uint32_t  tag;
00041 
00042     /** Tagtype in IH to use in input queue command. */
00043     uint8_t   tagtype;
00044 
00045     /** Param value in IRH to use in input queue command. */
00046     uint8_t   param;
00047 
00048     /** Opcode value in IRH to use in input queue command. */
00049     uint16_t  opcode;
00050 
00051     /** Group value in IH to use in input queue command. */
00052     uint8_t   grp:4;
00053 
00054     /** QOS in IH to use in input queue command. */
00055     uint8_t   qos:3;
00056 
00057     uint8_t   free:1;
00058 
00059     /** Number of input buffers */
00060     uint8_t   bufcount;
00061 
00062     /** The Peer Input queue to use to send data. */
00063     uint8_t   piq_id;
00064 
00065     uint8_t   reserved;
00066 
00067     /** List of input buffers */
00068     cvmx_buf_ptr_t  buf[MAX_EP_PKT_BUFS];
00069 
00070 } cn56xx_ep_packet_t;
